name: Sky Trooper - VR
description:
Sky Troopers is a short guided tour of our planets and a few stars in virtual reality. In-here you can experience realistic and immersive simulation of our Galaxy, "look around” and can interact with that environment during the game. It is a Spaceship combat game, with Newtonian space physics and third person controls. Your aim is to defend your spaceship from the space obstacles like Asteroid, Meteoroid, Meteor and other space debris. It works with VR headset, you can move the spaceship left and right with head movement and can destroy the coming obstacles with gun. To get gun you need to collect “Gems”. Each “Gem” provide us with the gun for a different span of time. The immersive environment is very much similar to the real world in order to create a lifelike experience.
So, Indulge yourself in the fascinating and adventurous experience of space travel!!
